name: Pooja 🌟
greetingText: I  really  like  your  name❤️   But!!!.....⚠️
wishText: I wish to be your constant variable.👨‍💻🖤
text2: That's what I was going to do.😅
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: We are like ''28th and 29th February'' bcz  We are Too Close but Too Far...!!!🙂
replayText: Or ➡️''Click Me''⬅️ , if you want to watch it Again........🎂🎔
